description.value:
You go to extreme lengths to support your allies, even when it means bringing harm to yourself.

If your next action is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Harm] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] from your healing or harmful font to restore Hit Points to a single ally, you can channel your own vitality along with the spell. You lose [[/r 1d8]] Hit Points per level of the spell, which can't be reduced or mitigated in any way, and your ally regains an equal number of Hit Points.
